    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void ensureContinentSize()
      Ensure valid WorldMap contains correct number of continents based on calculated value at start.
      void ensureTerritoriesSize()
      Ensure valid WorldMap contains correct number of territories based on calculated value at start.
      void invalidMapReturnsInvalid()
      Ensure that the loaded invalid map, which contains disconnected territories, is given the correct number when passed to ConnectedGraph, used when validating maps.
      void setup()  
      void validMapReturnsValid()
      Ensure that the correct map returns correct number when passed to ConnectedGraph.
